attributes.action: immigrants,students and tourists cannot enter Britain without medical cover
attributes.background: No medical cover no entry, unless your country of origin has an agreement with the united kingdom to treat British citizens, on a like for like basis , this will apply to all visitors to the United kingdom,emergency treatment will be provided only.This will save Billions on immigration, and the NHS

rejection.details:
Please note that you may wish to sign an existing petition on a similar subject:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/182047
